member.name: KSJACK_SINK_INFORMATION
member.summary: The KSJACK_SINK_INFORMATION structure stores information about an audio jack sink.

member.name: KSJACK_SINK_INFORMATION.ConnType
member.summary: Specifies the type of connection. The connection type values are defined in the enumeration.

member.name: KSJACK_SINK_INFORMATION.AudioLatency
member.summary: Specifies the latency of the audio sink.

member.name: KSJACK_SINK_INFORMATION.HDCPCapable
member.summary: Specifies whether the sink supports High-bandwidth Digital Content Protection (HDCP).

member.name: KSJACK_SINK_INFORMATION.AICapable
member.summary: Specifies whether the sink supports ACP Packet, ISRC1, or ISRC2.

member.name: KSJACK_SINK_INFORMATION.SinkDescriptionLength
member.summary: Specifies the length of the string in the SinkDescription member.

member.name: KSJACK_SINK_INFORMATION.SinkDescription
member.summary: String containing the monitor sink name. The maximum length is defined by the constant MAX_SINK_DESCRIPTION_NAME_LENGTH (32 wide characters).

member.name: KSJACK_SINK_INFORMATION.PortId
member.summary: Specifies the video port identifier in a structure.
